Incubations containing 100 μl of tissue homogenate, 100 μl of radioligand, (0.5 nM <sup>3</sup>H-Rol5-1788 [<sup>3</sup>H-Flumazenil] , specific activity 80 Ci/mmol) , and test compound or control (see below) , and are brought to a total volume of 500 μl with Buffer A.
